definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]

sentences.english: To explore the feasibility of ligating and embedding a pump in the iliac artery by laparoscopic.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹腔镜髂内动脉结扎及置泵可行性。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinic effect of ligating and hanging operating skill on circular mixed hemorrhoid.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察结扎悬吊法治疗环状混合痔临床疗效。

sentences.english: Methods Liferatures about celiac axis ligation were reviewed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法收集和回顾有关腹腔干结扎的相关文献。

sentences.english: Objective To find out the outcome of preventionchylothorax by prophylactic ligature thoracic duct in esophagealcacinoma procedure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨结扎胸导管对防止术后乳糜胸的效果。

sentences.english: Results Doppler-guided hemorrhoidal artery ligation and Milligan-Morgan hemorrhoidecomy were equally effective in controlling preoperative symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 结果结扎组和切除组患者术前症状均得到有效控制。

sentences.english: Two ends of the rod were tied with a white thread and fixed on the skin near nose with plastic tape.
sentences.chinese: 用白线结扎硅胶条二端后以胶布固定在鼻旁皮肤上。

sentences.english: In the control group, the sutures passed around the coronary artery but were not tied.
sentences.chinese: 在对照组，缝线绕过大鼠的冠状动脉但不结扎。

sentences.english: The brain artery was ligated and then infused.
sentences.chinese: 结扎住中脑动脉，而后再注入。

sentences.english: Furazolidone and carbenoxolone showed synergistic effects on the pyloric ligation model.
sentences.chinese: 呋喃唑酮和生胃酮对幽门结扎模型的保护有协同作用。

sentences.english: The left descending branch of coronary artery of the rat was ligated to establish myocardium ischemic model.
sentences.chinese: 结扎大鼠冠状动脉左前降支建立心肌缺血模型。

sentences.english: The ligated liver lobes underwent an atrophy gradually.
sentences.chinese: 门静脉分支结扎的肝叶逐渐萎缩。

sentences.english: Do carry out ligation operation , can on the spot after aborticide?
sentences.chinese: 堕胎后就地进行结扎手术，可以吗？

sentences.english: Transection and ligation of the perforators are important.
sentences.chinese: 切断结扎返流的交通支十分重要。

sentences.english: Coronary artery was not ligatured in the sham operated group.
sentences.chinese: 假手术对照组在穿线后不结扎。

sentences.english: The left cephalic artery of each rat was ligated, and the right side was the control.
sentences.chinese: 每只大鼠结扎左侧颈总动脉，右侧未作结扎作为对照。

sentences.english: The left cephalic artery of each rat was ligated, and the right side was the control.
sentences.chinese: 每只大鼠结扎左侧颈总动脉，右侧未作结扎作为对照。
